Articles.Content:
So, I present to you...

this thingy => [box]

oh, yeah, you get shinemetik, too!

What? What do you need, another box? Awww, I'm all out...

On a more serious note, please tell me what you think.

It's my first (attempt at a) cinematic, not just my first KSP one.

Thanks,

-Naten.

Enjoy!

Awww, the ending was sad.

For a first cinematic, I really liked it. One thing you could try in the future is to sync some parts of the music "changes" with the video.

Lovely camera work with the first spaceplane flight! And 'Outro' still lifts the hairs on my neck - good choice.

If I could offer one criticism, it feels a little like two separate cinematics compressed into one. On the one hand - joy of flight, thrill of discovery and on the other - disaster movie. Both were very well done but might work even better as two separate pieces.

Says the guy who's never put together any sort of animation in his life mind you, so make of my comments what you will.

Thank you, all of you. Although, the whole "two cinematics in one" was to just give a feel of "why" and "why don't we do something useful" as well as "why do we take the risk, we're gonna die sooner or later," all in one. Thanks, though!

P.S., KSK, I thank you and make an OK amount of thought out of your criticism, thanks.
